title: Peer Mentor
description: I am currently a peer mentor for first-year software engineering students. I help them by being a resource for them to ask questions and get help.

title: Undergraduate TA
description: I was a Teaching Assistant for a programming course in taught Java. I led weekly labs and office hours for students to get help with their assignments and projects.

title: Hack Club
description: I was part of the Hack Club executive team for over a year. I helped organize hackathons and workshops for students to learn how to code.

title: DevsDoGood
description: I was part of a team for DevsDoGood to create a website for the non-profit West Des Moines Community School Alumni Association.
